PHRASE.LANG: Loosely translated from the hieroglyphs: "Here lies Pharaoh Homenkhammun, about whom dancers rejoice and upon whom the Eye of Horus lingers. Loved by all, may he find further glory in the West." [#Legal]

Traduit librement des hiéroglyphes: "Ci-gît le pharaon Homenkhammun, qui réjouit tous les danseurs, et sur lequel s'attarde l'oeil d'Horus. Aimé de tous, puisse-t-il trouver la gloire en Occident." [#Legal]

Die Hieroglyphen sagen frei übersetzt: "Hier ruht Pharao Homenkhammun, dem die Tänzer huldigen und über den das Auge des Horus wacht. Von allen geliebt, möge er seinen Ruhm mehren im Westen." [#Legal]

Traduzione approssimata dal geroglifico: "Qui giace il faraone Homenkhammun, onorato dai balli dei danzatori e protetto dall'occhio di Horus. Amato da tutti, possa trovare nuova gloria in occidente." [#Legal]

Traducción libre de los jeroglíficos: "Aquí yace el faraón Homenkamón, a quien los danzarines honran con sus bailes y a quien el Ojo de Horus guarda. Amado por todos, que encuentre la gloria en el oeste". [#Legal]

Loosely translated from the hieroglyphs: "Here lies Pharaoh Homenkhammun, about whom dancers rejoice and upon whom the Eye of Horus lingers. Loved by all, may he find further glory in the West." [#Legal]
상형문자 해독 결과: "파라오 호멘카문이 여기 잠들다. 무희들은 그를 위해 춤을 추었고 호루스의 눈이 그에게 머물러 있었다. 모두의 사랑을 받은 이 파라오가 부디 서쪽에서 안식을 찾기를." [#Legal]

Loosely translated from the hieroglyphs: "Here lies Pharaoh Homenkhammun, about whom dancers rejoice and upon whom the Eye of Horus lingers. Loved by all, may he find further glory in the West." [#Legal]
以下意譯自埃及象形文字：「法老王荷曼卡門沉睡於此，荷魯斯神凝視著歡欣歌頌的舞者。法老王集萬千寵愛在一身，但願在極樂世界獲得更大的榮耀。」 [#Legal]
以下意譯自埃及象形文字：「法老王荷曼卡門沉睡於此，荷魯斯神凝視著歡欣歌頌的舞者。法老王集萬千寵愛在一身，但願在極樂世界獲得更大的榮耀。」 [#Legal]

Loosely translated from the hieroglyphs: "Here lies Pharaoh Homenkhammun, about whom dancers rejoice and upon whom the Eye of Horus lingers. Loved by all, may he find further glory in the West." [#Legal]
